snippet: The Kansas City Royals acquired the starting pitchers James Shields and Wade Davis from the Tampa Bay Rays for outfielder Wil Myers and other top prospects.
abstract: Kansas City Royals acquire starting pitchers James Shields and Wade Davis from Tampa Bay Rays for outfielder Wil Myers and other top prospects; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Kansas City Royals acquired the starting pitchers James Shields and Wade Davis from the Tampa Bay Rays for outfielder Wil Myers and other top prospects.
